thread.title: BRIEF-Ipsen Announces Health Canada Approval Of Dysport Therapeutic For Treatment Of Lower Limb Spasticity In Adults

title: BRIEF-Ipsen Announces Health Canada Approval Of Dysport Therapeutic For Treatment Of Lower Limb Spasticity In Adults

organizations.name: brief-ipsen announces health canada approval of dysport therapeutic for treatment of lower limb
brief-ipsen announces health canada approval of dy
treatment of lower limb spasticity in adults reuters

text: March 15, 2018 / 12:15 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Ipsen Announces Health Canada Approval Of Dysport Therapeutic For Treatment Of Lower Limb Spasticity In Adults Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Ipsen Sa: * IPSEN ANNOUNCES HEALTH CANADA APPROVAL OF DYSPORT THERAPEUTIC (ABOBOTULINUMTOXINA) FOR THE TREATMENT OF LOWER LIMB SPASTICITY IN ADULTS * IPSEN SA - HEALTH CANADA APPROVED DYSPORT THERAPEUTIC FOR SYMPTOMATIC TREATMENT OF FOCAL SPASTICITY AFFECTING LOWER LIMBS IN ADULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
